title: Keyboard problems
body:
Sometimes my keys will stop doing anything while on lol. It started this week and has happened 2 times. 
The keyboard (both laptop one and usb) suddenly stop working, both times right when entering a game. All keys except the outer ones (mayus, alt, tab, esc, f1,f2...) 
It works normally in other things, i can type in windows, chrome etc, but wont work in lol (client, password entering, game, all lol)

replies.body:
Are you able to try another keyboard, in case the issue may be hardware related?  If it's not your hardware, there could be an issue with your config as well, which is especially prone to happen if any manual modifications were made:

 **Log into the game** then hop into **a custom game**. *Alt+Tab* out of the match, then navigate to your League installation folder, which should be in C:\Riot Games\League of Legends

Delete the folder named **Config**

Once you've deleted the folder, leave the custom match. You'll then want to hop into another custom match to confirm the changes were saved.

I hope that helps!

Definitely not hardware, tried various keyboards and the same happened.
Ill try that when i get home and see if it happens again, thx!
